channel.title: Alien Swarm Draw Distance
channel.description:
Does anyone know how I could increase the draw distance in Alien Swarm when using a remote turret?
Right now when I use the remote turret I have set up there is a nasty back clipping plane somewhere around 1200 units. What I would need though is 1400 units so the far corner across the room would not get clipped off.
I've tried all sorts of crazy experiments with point_clientcommand and point_servercommand turning sv_cheats on and then setting r_farz to 1400. It seems point_clientcommand won't do its job. :frowning:
If I set the r_farz manually it works just fine.
So, is there something simple I have missed that would help me with this? Or something overly complex? Any way to make this work? Otherwise I will have to move the turret closer to the corner and I really wouldn't want to do that.
